def Load(widget): from Benner.Tecnologia.Business import Query registro = widget.Entity if registro == None: return if widget.View.Commands["Edit"] != None : widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = (registro.Fields["STATUS"].Value in (1, 4)) if widget.View.Commands["Delete"] != None : widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = (registro.Fields["STATUS"].Value in (1, 4)) handleRegistro = registro.Fields["HANDLE"].ToString() if handleRegistro == "": return
sqlSituacaoDocumento = Query("SELECT STATUS FROM CN_ACIDENTESTRABALHO WHERE HANDLE = " + registro.Fields["HANDLE"].ToString())
situacaoDocumento = sqlSituacaoDocumento.Execute()
widget.View.Commands["CMD_ENVIARAPROVACAO"].Visible = situacaoDocumento[0]["STATUS"].GetString()=="1"
